KH.content: Socrates’ desire to animate representation of political, of ideal State, by seeing it at war, in relation to death, outside of its graphical hallucination (immobility) which is the only way poets & Sophists can speak of politics [zoographic fiction, see p. 123]
KH.linkedContent: Socrates’ desire to animate representation of political, of ideal State, by seeing it at war, in relation to death, outside of its graphical hallucination (immobility) which is the only way poets & Sophists can speak of politics [zoographic fiction, see p. 123]

H.content: law (is always) laid down, laid down against some nature, an instituted thesis > laws that command, impassive, oversees behind glass, tomb of glass
H.linkedContent: law (is always) laid down, laid down against some nature, an instituted thesis > laws that command, impassive, oversees behind glass, tomb of glass

GOD.content: one must suppress the object of the gift, to keep in the gift only the giving
GOD.linkedContent: one must suppress the object of the gift, to keep in the gift only the giving

MC.content: ever since Plato [repression of Democritus, a large symptom?], an organization of the throw: subject/object > repress chance, repress the mark, protect “normality,” isolate a solid context (stereotomy)
MC.linkedContent: ever since Plato [repression of Democritus, a large symptom?], an organization of the throw: subject/object > repress chance, repress the mark, protect “normality,” isolate a solid context (stereotomy)

MC.content: not that all fiction, all inscription of proper names has literary dimension, but they arise in a place where limits are never real, never immobile, never solid—only the effects of contextual isolation > pragrammatological (intersection of pragmatics & grammatology)
MC.linkedContent: not that all fiction, all inscription of proper names has literary dimension, but they arise in a place where limits are never real, never immobile, never solid—only the effects of contextual isolation > pragrammatological (intersection of pragmatics & grammatology)

AF.content: no objectivization is pure, nor in truth rigorously possible
AF.linkedContent: no objectivization is pure, nor in truth rigorously possible

AF.content: one cannot objectivize the archive [call on its names, employ it, make it gain in auctoritas] w/out remainder, archive produces more archive, never closed, opens to the future
AF.linkedContent: one cannot objectivize the archive [call on its names, employ it, make it gain in auctoritas] w/out remainder, archive produces more archive, never closed, opens to the future

SPOM.content: totalitarianism in Marxism/Communism can be explained as a fear of the ghost, Lenin and Stalin hardened themselves w/ “cadaverous rigor”
SPOM.linkedContent: totalitarianism in Marxism/Communism can be explained as a fear of the ghost, Lenin and Stalin hardened themselves w/ “cadaverous rigor”

SPOM.content: phantasmagoria of a commerce btwn market things makes socius seem natural, labor objectified in things, while denaturalizing thing become commodity
SPOM.linkedContent: phantasmagoria of a commerce btwn market things makes socius seem natural, labor objectified in things, while denaturalizing thing become commodity

SPOM.content: for Marx, there’s a phantomatic objectivity before commodity value [?] product of labor petrifies, erects, hardens (feminine character of commodity-chimera?)
SPOM.linkedContent: for Marx, there’s a phantomatic objectivity before commodity value [?] product of labor petrifies, erects, hardens (feminine character of commodity-chimera?)

BL.content: all watchmen (critics, academics, literary theorists, writers, and philosophers), who guard positive laws, value of signatures, & identity of corpora, receive same answer in their appeal to the law: differance > plus de loi et plus de littérature
BL.linkedContent: all watchmen (critics, academics, literary theorists, writers, and philosophers), who guard positive laws, value of signatures, & identity of corpora, receive same answer in their appeal to the law: differance > plus de loi et plus de littérature

HERP.content: acc. Heidegger, when conflict stops, when one doesn’t hear the unheard, being is no longer kept, becomes an object, a spectacle, in the quelled visibility of objects facing us
HERP.linkedContent: acc. Heidegger, when conflict stops, when one doesn’t hear the unheard, being is no longer kept, becomes an object, a spectacle, in the quelled visibility of objects facing us

HERP.content: seeing a decay like that which occurs to hearing, suffers when polemos is quelled, sight degenerates into optics > creators (poets, thinkers, statesmen) are no longer tolerated [Nietzsche]
HERP.linkedContent: seeing a decay like that which occurs to hearing, suffers when polemos is quelled, sight degenerates into optics > creators (poets, thinkers, statesmen) are no longer tolerated [Nietzsche]

POOF.content: hexis binds 2x in same time, such contretemporality another name for psukhé, accounts for, registers, l’épreuve du temps, withholds (en garder) its trace in the body [by way of inscription] > the yoke effect
POOF.linkedContent: hexis binds 2x in same time, such contretemporality another name for psukhé, accounts for, registers, l’épreuve du temps, withholds (en garder) its trace in the body [by way of inscription] > the yoke effect

POOF.content: friendship can never elude rhetoric of epitáphios, transfixed celebration of spectrality, at once fervent & caught in petrified cold of its inscription (funeral speech, testamentary fervor of heir)
POOF.linkedContent: friendship can never elude rhetoric of epitáphios, transfixed celebration of spectrality, at once fervent & caught in petrified cold of its inscription (funeral speech, testamentary fervor of heir)

PP.content: pharmakon is but a formula learned by heart, dead, rigid knowledge shut up (enfermé) in biblia, foreign to living knowledge and dialectic
PP.linkedContent: pharmakon is but a formula learned by heart, dead, rigid knowledge shut up (enfermé) in biblia, foreign to living knowledge and dialectic

PP.content: acc. Theuth myth, language transmits the message of a fixed design
PP.linkedContent: acc. Theuth myth, language transmits the message of a fixed design

PP.content: bewitchment (l’envoûtement) > always effect of representation, capturing, captivating, the form of the other, par excellence his face, the vultus
PP.linkedContent: bewitchment (l’envoûtement) > always effect of representation, capturing, captivating, the form of the other, par excellence his face, the vultus

VP.content: for Husserl, transcendental psychologism substantializes distance, inconsistency, btwn transcendental and empirical self, freezes light at its source
VP.linkedContent: for Husserl, transcendental psychologism substantializes distance, inconsistency, btwn transcendental and empirical self, freezes light at its source

FSW.content: an immobile topography [& not a dynamic one] would freeze energy in “a naïve metaphorics of place” > for Freud, must rethink topology/space of conscious writing
FSW.linkedContent: an immobile topography [& not a dynamic one] would freeze energy in “a naïve metaphorics of place” > for Freud, must rethink topology/space of conscious writing

FWT.content: Derrida feels closer to Lacan than Foucault, he’s more daring a “deconstructor” > Foucault’s passage btwn epistemes neglects long sequences (hardens into oppositions)
FWT.linkedContent: Derrida feels closer to Lacan than Foucault, he’s more daring a “deconstructor” > Foucault’s passage btwn epistemes neglects long sequences (hardens into oppositions)

DS.content: [Derrida comes back to i] reads little point as a decapitation right next to castrated pike > capital I (disseminates unity of meaning), ego, ice, écho—plus-je > (I + Dé)irisation
DS.linkedContent: [Derrida comes back to i] reads little point as a decapitation right next to castrated pike > capital I (disseminates unity of meaning), ego, ice, écho—plus-je > (I + Dé)irisation

P.content: reserve, savings, stock: self-protection of the work (ergon), binding (Verbindung) of energy, condition for “mastery” of pleasure-principle
P.linkedContent: reserve, savings, stock: self-protection of the work (ergon), binding (Verbindung) of energy, condition for “mastery” of pleasure-principle

GSP.content: certain atemporal fixedness in phenomenological ideal objectivity as concerns subjective becoming (Logical Investigations)
GSP.linkedContent: certain atemporal fixedness in phenomenological ideal objectivity as concerns subjective becoming (Logical Investigations)

GSP.content: neither structure (which isolates objective significations in their static originality) nor genesis (which effects abusive transitions from one region to the other) clarifies Husserl’s problem: foundation of objectivity ——to point to prior circumscription of natural regions (domains of objectivity) in utilization of notions genesis and structure can only be derived from phenomenological critique > thus it is always rightfully primary
GSP.linkedContent: neither structure (which isolates objective significations in their static originality) nor genesis (which effects abusive transitions from one region to the other) clarifies Husserl’s problem: foundation of objectivity ——to point to prior circumscription of natural regions (domains of objectivity) in utilization of notions genesis and structure can only be derived from phenomenological critique > thus it is always rightfully primary

SW.content: silkworm secretes absolutely, a thing which would never be an object it would stand against
SW.linkedContent: silkworm secretes absolutely, a thing which would never be an object it would stand against

DPi.content: DP requires a third party, arbitrating authority foreign/superior to parties of dispute, a reason of state, a rationality, logos w/ universal claims > beyond individual passion/affect
DPi.linkedContent: DP requires a third party, arbitrating authority foreign/superior to parties of dispute, a reason of state, a rationality, logos w/ universal claims > beyond individual passion/affect

DPi.content: w/ DP, rationality rises above heart (individual passion), alliance btwn reason & machine, universal claim of state right, frozen rigor, rigor mortis, “freezing insensitivity,” police-like, virile appearance > thus, many abolitionists appeal to feminine, heart, immediate feeling
DPi.linkedContent: w/ DP, rationality rises above heart (individual passion), alliance btwn reason & machine, universal claim of state right, frozen rigor, rigor mortis, “freezing insensitivity,” police-like, virile appearance > thus, many abolitionists appeal to feminine, heart, immediate feeling

RGE.content: a text [Bataille’s] that traces, in silence, structure of the eye [illumination] > in contriving/weaving (tramer) “l’absolu déchirement,” absolutely rends (déchire) its own tissue—once more “solid” and servile de se donner encore à lire
RGE.linkedContent: a text [Bataille’s] that traces, in silence, structure of the eye [illumination] > in contriving/weaving (tramer) “l’absolu déchirement,” absolutely rends (déchire) its own tissue—once more “solid” and servile de se donner encore à lire

REST.content: Verlässlichkeit laces and lets loose at same time, restitutes “profoundest” going-back behind the philosophemes of matter-form, subjectivity, law, etc., but also [restitutes] most naively archaic regression to trust, that which can let itself be had (se laisser prendre), can abandon itself to the primary/crudest trap, trap before all traps, to a lure constituted by mirror play of the world, its Spiegelspiel [Levinas-like critique? or affirmation of Duplicity?]
REST.linkedContent: Verlässlichkeit laces and lets loose at same time, restitutes “profoundest” going-back behind the philosophemes of matter-form, subjectivity, law, etc., but also [restitutes] most naively archaic regression to trust, that which can let itself be had (se laisser prendre), can abandon itself to the primary/crudest trap, trap before all traps, to a lure constituted by mirror play of the world, its Spiegelspiel [Levinas-like critique? or affirmation of Duplicity?]

REST.content: Shapiro’s restitution brings a ghost back alive to a dead man, mais revenant, revenant vivant au mort: dès lors vivant, lui-même revenant, who is himself then a ghost returning, “personal object” coming back to the ghost (revenant au revenant)
REST.linkedContent: Shapiro’s restitution brings a ghost back alive to a dead man, mais revenant, revenant vivant au mort: dès lors vivant, lui-même revenant, who is himself then a ghost returning, “personal object” coming back to the ghost (revenant au revenant)

REST.content: sacrifice in memory of another dead man, who [Goldstein] remains stony, like his name, mais revient aussi, comme un revenant, grâce au don de ce revenant
REST.linkedContent: sacrifice in memory of another dead man, who [Goldstein] remains stony, like his name, mais revient aussi, comme un revenant, grâce au don de ce revenant

WAP.content: working w/ Bourdieu’s idea of objectification, Derrida sees an infinite task: “objectifiable” is not objectifiable: always exceeds scene of visibility
WAP.linkedContent: working w/ Bourdieu’s idea of objectification, Derrida sees an infinite task: “objectifiable” is not objectifiable: always exceeds scene of visibility

WAP.content: achievement of “complete objectification” would ensure sociology’s absolute hegemony, i.e. absolute knowledge
WAP.linkedContent: achievement of “complete objectification” would ensure sociology’s absolute hegemony, i.e. absolute knowledge

WAP.content: what if truth of objectivity no longer took the form of an object?
WAP.linkedContent: what if truth of objectivity no longer took the form of an object?

WAP.content: the fold of such supplement of objectification marks a differential limit which could as well apply to thematization (cf. DS)
WAP.linkedContent: the fold of such supplement of objectification marks a differential limit which could as well apply to thematization (cf. DS)

AFR.content: [re: need to desire, desire as end w/out end] moment stone (statue) comes to life, works to reduce gap, (not) become dead again—contrary to frivolous distraction, to headstrong identity of signs: fear of Medusa, legitimacy itself [fear of frivolous = fear of Medusa?]
AFR.linkedContent: [re: need to desire, desire as end w/out end] moment stone (statue) comes to life, works to reduce gap, (not) become dead again—contrary to frivolous distraction, to headstrong identity of signs: fear of Medusa, legitimacy itself [fear of frivolous = fear of Medusa?]

C.content: morceaux de mots as objects (which are abject)
C.linkedContent: morceaux de mots as objects (which are abject)

TN.content: objectivity of being(s): 1) exposed before a gaze 2) opposes a resistance to touch > does the hand (being-before-the-hand) reconcile these two positional values of objectivity?
TN.linkedContent: objectivity of being(s): 1) exposed before a gaze 2) opposes a resistance to touch > does the hand (being-before-the-hand) reconcile these two positional values of objectivity?

BSi.content: bêtise as becoming “what” of “who”—monument, stone, becoming-thing of proper name
BSi.linkedContent: bêtise as becoming “what” of “who”—monument, stone, becoming-thing of proper name

BSi.content: culture of curiosity, treating, curing: violence of enclosing/objectifying
BSi.linkedContent: culture of curiosity, treating, curing: violence of enclosing/objectifying

OG.content: writing as painting is evil and remedy, pharmakon, zoographeme betrays being & speech, freezes (fige) them > writing as representation (painting) of la bête chassée: capture et meurtre magiques
OG.linkedContent: writing as painting is evil and remedy, pharmakon, zoographeme betrays being & speech, freezes (fige) them > writing as representation (painting) of la bête chassée: capture et meurtre magiques

OG.content: that writing carries death, Rousseau would agree w/out reservation
OG.linkedContent: that writing carries death, Rousseau would agree w/out reservation

EU.content: ontological-encyclopedic hegemony/structure, univerticality, tends to immobilize all recognized borders > all-powerful & powerless (destiny of philosophy subjected to State power)
EU.linkedContent: ontological-encyclopedic hegemony/structure, univerticality, tends to immobilize all recognized borders > all-powerful & powerless (destiny of philosophy subjected to State power)

EU.content: CIPH will outline different topology: horizontal, transversal, heterogenous > experiment
EU.linkedContent: CIPH will outline different topology: horizontal, transversal, heterogenous > experiment

SPEC.content: Freud had a hard time recognizing himself among his own (les siens) [fort/da] > not unrelated to origin of objectivity (tribunal forbidden to judge the conditions of its establishment)
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud had a hard time recognizing himself among his own (les siens) [fort/da] > not unrelated to origin of objectivity (tribunal forbidden to judge the conditions of its establishment)

FV.content: for signifier to be kept (pour que le signifiant se garde) in its letter—no partition (if divisible, always can be lost en route) > materiality—indivisibility—idealization—point de capiton (staples signifier to signified) [?]: Lacan determines letter (no matter what he says) at point of its meaning (ideality): letter escapes partition, movement [no wonder he calls this “materiality” “odd”]
FV.linkedContent: for signifier to be kept (pour que le signifiant se garde) in its letter—no partition (if divisible, always can be lost en route) > materiality—indivisibility—idealization—point de capiton (staples signifier to signified) [?]: Lacan determines letter (no matter what he says) at point of its meaning (ideality): letter escapes partition, movement [no wonder he calls this “materiality” “odd”]
